related.meaning: membayar di muka, membayar untuk yang lain

lessons.japanese: テントを組み立てるのに３０分かかった。
lessons.indonesian: It took us half an hour to set up the tent.

lessons.japanese: あなたはそれらを組み立てるだけでいいのです。
lessons.indonesian: You have only to put them together.

lessons.japanese: 模型船を組み立てるのに私は１週間以上かかった。
lessons.indonesian: It took me more than a week to put the model ship together.

lessons.japanese: 時計を分解するのは組み立てるより簡単だ。
lessons.indonesian: Taking a watch apart is easier than putting it together.

lessons.japanese: 時計を組み立てるのはちょっと難しい。
lessons.indonesian: It is rather difficult to assemble a watch.

lessons.japanese: テントを組み立てるのに３０分かかった。
lessons.indonesian: It took us half an hour to set up the tent.

lessons.japanese: あなたはそれらを組み立てるだけでいいのです。
lessons.indonesian: You have only to put them together.

lessons.japanese: 時計を組み立てるのはちょっと難しい。
lessons.indonesian: It is rather difficult to assemble a watch.
